text: Porto Ceresio is a comune (municipality) on Lake Lugano in the Province of Varese in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is about northwest of Milan and about northeast of Varese, on the border with Switzerland. Porto Ceresio is next to these municipalities: Besano, Brusimpiano, Brusino Arsizio (Switzerland), Cuasso al Monte, Meride (Switzerland), Morcote (Switzerland). == References == Category:Settlements in Varese
title: Porto Ceresio
